00011 #define ELMO_CURRENT_INDEX_ACTUAL_VALUE 0x6078
00012 #define ELMO_POSITION_ERROR_INDEX_VALUE 0x20A1
00013 #define ELMO_CONTROLWORD 0x6040
00014 #define ELMO_STATUSWORD 0x6041
00015 #define ELMO_HOME_OFFSET 0x607C
00016 #define ELMO_DISPLAY_MODE_OF_OPERATION 0x6061
00017 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD 0x6098
00018 #define ELMO_HOMING_SPEEDS 0x6099
00019 #define ELMO_HOMING_SPEEDS_SWITCH 1
00020 #define ELMO_HOMING_SPEEDS_INDEX_PULSE 2
00021 #define ELMO_HOMING_ACCELERATION 0x609A
00022 #define ELMO_BITMASK_HOMING_ATTAINED 4096
00023 #define ELMO_MODE_OF_OPERATION 0x6060
00024 #define ELMO_MODE_HOMING 6
00025 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_POSITIVE_LIMIT_SWITCH_AND_INDEX_PULSE 2
00026 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEGATIVE_LIMIT_SWITCH_AND_INDEX_PULSE 1
00027 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_CURRENT_POSITION 35
00028 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_INDEX_LEFT 5
00029 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_INDEX_RIGHT 6
00030 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_LEFT 21
00031 #define ELMO_HOMING_METHOD_NEG_HOME_SWITCH_RIGHT 22
00032 #define ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED 1024

00045 int initializeMotorControllerDevice(epos_node_p mc, int id,
00046                 can_device_t* can_dev) {
00047         int error = 0;
00048         ROS_INFO("Initializing Motor Controller %d", id);
00049         config_t config;
00050         param_t param;
00051         //Epos-Config
00052         config_init(&config);
00053         param_init_int(&param, "node-id", id);
00054         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00055         param_init_int(&param, "enc-pulse", 2000);
00056         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00057         param_init_int(&param, "control-type", 3);
00058         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00059         param_init_int(&param, "enc-type", 3);
00060         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00061         param_init_int(&param, "motor-type", 10);
00062         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00063         param_init_int(&param, "motor-current", 1);
00064         config_set_param(&config, &param);
00065         epos_init(mc, can_dev, &config);
00066         config_destroy(&config);
00067         printf("Opening node... ");
00068         fflush(stdout);
00069         error = epos_open(mc);
00070         if (error) {
00071                 ROS_ERROR("error (%d).\n", error);
00072                 return error;
00073         } else
00074                 printf("OK.\n");
00075         mc->dev.node_id = id;
00076         mc->gear.sensor->num_pulses = 2048; //nominell 2000
00077         mc->gear.transmission = 100.0;
00078         return 0;
00079 }
00080 
00081 float elmo_get_current(epos_device_p dev) {
00082         short current;
00083         epos_device_read(dev, ELMO_CURRENT_INDEX_ACTUAL_VALUE, 0, (unsigned char*)&current, sizeof(short));
00084 
00085         return ((float) current) / 1000.0;
00086 }
00087 
00088 float elmo_get_position_error(epos_node_p node) {
00089         int position;
00090         epos_device_read(&node->dev, ELMO_POSITION_ERROR_INDEX_VALUE, 0, (unsigned char*)&position, sizeof(int));
00091 
00092         return epos_gear_to_angle(&node->gear, position);
00093 }
00094 
00095 void elmo_start_homing (epos_node_p node, float speed, unsigned int acceleration, int datum, unsigned char method) {
00096         epos_control_set_type(&node->control, epos_control_homing);
00097         epos_device_write(&node->dev, EPOS_HOME_INDEX_METHOD, 0, &method, 1);
00098         //epos_home_set_method(&node->dev, method);
00099         epos_home_set_offset(&node->dev, datum);
00100         epos_home_set_switch_search_velocity(&node->dev, abs(epos_gear_from_angular_velocity(&node->gear,
00101                                                         speed)));
00102         epos_home_set_zero_search_velocity(&node->dev, abs(epos_gear_from_angular_velocity(&node->gear,
00103                                                         speed)));
00104         epos_home_set_acceleration(&node->dev, acceleration);
00105         //epos_home_set_position(&node->dev, 1000);
00106         //epos_profile_set_type(&node->dev, epos_profile_linear);
00107         epos_device_set_control(&node->dev, EPOS_DEVICE_CONTROL_SHUTDOWN);
00108         epos_control_start(&node->control);
00109         epos_device_set_control(&node->dev, EPOS_HOME_CONTROL_START);
00110 
00111         epos_control_start(&node->control);
00112         epos_device_set_control(&node->dev, EPOS_HOME_CONTROL_START);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void elmo_wait_homed(epos_device_p dev, ros::Rate *rate, NiftiArmNode * arm) {
00116         while (!(EPOS_HOME_STATUS_REACHED & epos_device_get_status(dev))
00117                         && ros::ok()) {
00118                 rate->sleep();
00119                 arm->position_error_Control();
00120                 arm->publishStatus();
00121                 //ros::spinOnce();
00122         }
00123 }
00124 
00125 void elmo_wait_target_reached(epos_device_p dev, ros::Rate *rate, NiftiArmNode * arm) {
00126         while (!(epos_device_get_status(dev) & ELMO_BITMASK_TARGET_REACHED) && ros::ok()) {
00127                 rate->sleep();
00128                 arm->position_error_Control();
00129                 arm->publishStatus();
00130                 //ros::spinOnce();
00131         }
00132 }
